extendedInfo.description: Who pays the wine?Play the game to see who pays, find your inner wine, and join us for a good company, this app.We're not a wine guide, we are your partner for meals, bars and events. We recommend the best wines that marry your mood, types of food and different activities that you can be involve.It is an app to know what wine to order on certain occasion, to look good before who want to know what wine says something about you, so you can enjoy a new and original way of discover the world of wine.
